import React from 'react' import '../styles/TourDetails.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tours return (

{tit}
) } export default TourDetail
